alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 08 at 1:45PM CST until February 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma...Arkansas... Illinois River at Chewey affecting Cherokee, Adair and Delaware Counties. Flint Creek near Kansas affecting Cherokee and Delaware Counties. Mulberry River near Mulberry affecting Crawford and Franklin Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Mulberry River near Mulberry. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, no flooding occurs but the river is swift and dangerous. Backwater from the Arkansas River may affect low lying areas near the first few miles of the Mulberry River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 2.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.5 feet tomorrow morning. - Action stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
